extendedInfo.description: Bubble Bird, derives from classic bubble match-three game, such as Bubble Pop plus, Bubble Shoot, Bubble Bust, etc. But with more new exciting features.âââââ How to play âââââ1. Shoot the bird and match 3 or more adjacent birds with the same color to blast them;2. Clear the birds and blast the hidden bird's nest;3. Gain more gold coins to unlock some special levels or buy the power ups.We believe that everyone is a gamer at heart and that games are a great source of joy and relaxation. So Ezjoy always try to make the games easy and joy. For Bubble Bird, we want to make it the best bubble match-three game on Android and your 5-star reviews keep us inspired and motivated. Visit m.ezjoygame.com from your Android device to see the whole gamelist.Enormous thanks to everyone for their playing, feedback, and support.

reviews.title: Love this game
reviews.comment: I love it.  It is so addictive.   I use to love bubble shoot and lost the app.  This is so much like it.  Lots of fun.
reviews.author: Kelly McElfresh

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: It\'s highly addictive and keeps my 2 year old daughter (21 month old) busy
reviews.author: RosaBelle Elizabeth

reviews.comment: Bit cranky In there. No real guide just start shoot ten which is fun mind you.\tSo give it a birdy go.
reviews.author: Debbie Butler

reviews.title: Fab game
reviews.comment: Finally an off-line game to match bubble witch saga - great fun and v addictive
reviews.author: Annie Houghton

reviews.title: Sound settings
reviews.comment: It\'s designed so that you have to pay to win eventually. There are some levels that, no matter what you do, you just aren\'t going to win. I\'ve taken many games like this to the very end getting 3 stars all the way, so I\'m not just a poor loser when I say this.
reviews.author: April Smith

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Its so cool & its so nice!!!!! Ilove this game & so addictive i really enjoy it.. =\'>
reviews.author: Frances Irene Alcantara

reviews.title: Its an entertainment game very enteresting
reviews.comment: I love it an the Lil owl\"s and OE birds are so cute  toatel classic for shire. If you don\'t have it you should get it
reviews.author: Krystal Riggle

reviews.title: This game is cool!
reviews.comment: Very fun I usually give to my siblings (who are still studying) to relax by playing this game also very challenging (even I like this game! )
reviews.author: Anne Riana

reviews.title: More levels
reviews.comment: I love this game! I would still play it all the time if I didn\'t get 3 stars on every level already. Needs more levels!!!!
reviews.author: Sara Gafforio

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Superb game guys try it its more fun than the original version of angry birds. ...
reviews.author: carlos santos marial

reviews.title: Upset
reviews.comment: I beat level 14 but it want unlock level 15 every time I replay 14 it gets faster and faster.
reviews.author: Renee Cornelius

reviews.title: One of the best games I have ever played..
reviews.comment: This has to be my favorite game I played in a long time. very addicting!!
reviews.author: Marianne Black

reviews.title: B
reviews.comment: Very addictive. I love this game. Jus updated it to get the extra levels and I\'m almost done I wish it had more levels. But all in all I love it n its a great game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty cool
reviews.comment: This game becomes addicting after the first two levels. And makes you wanna keep playing I get so into it.
reviews.author: Tonishia Brice

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Needs different background pics.. Too fast.. Should have levels..
reviews.author: omnia sakr

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.comment: I have a galaxy 3 and I love this game... I would recommend this game. Better than angry birds... BIG FLAW...every time i open this app it takes me to the app store.  Thats annoying
reviews.author: Jasmine Mosley

reviews.title: Nice:)
reviews.comment: The game is very entertaining but there are lots of adds that popup. But if you turn your phone onto airplane mode there are no more adds. Well done Ezjoy!
reviews.author: Louise Adkin

reviews.comment: Absolutely love it. Its different and one of the best games. 5 stars. Love the birds.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: frustrating
reviews.comment: birds comes down faster then they can reload very frustrating uninstalled
reviews.author: Lorraine Osborne

reviews.title: Needs work!
reviews.comment: Would be a great game except it constantly freezes & by the time it unfreezes & catches itself up, you have failed the level. Very frustrating. I play other bubble pop games & don\'t have this problem.
reviews.author: carmen patterson
